body: Hello guys I am going to spain today, I will not be bringing my computer not wanting to forget it or for it to be broken in the 8 hour flight to barcalona ! I will also be meeting up with a member of my clan there which is going to be cool!, I will be uploading pictures to show you lovely people, Keep me posted on the news, this means I will not be able to make 2 avicus week news :( sorry but when I get back, I will tell one hell of a story!

title: Spain
